plot: When Raju Rai accidentally activates an experimental suit that unleashes the mystical chakras of the body, he gains superpowers and vows to protect the people of Mumbai as Chakra the Invincible.
title: Chakra the Invincible
plot_es: When Raju Rai accidentally activates an experimental suit that unleashes the mystical chakras of the body, he gains superpowers and vows to protect the people of Mumbai as Chakra the Invincible.
plot_en: When Raju Rai accidentally activates an experimental suit that unleashes the mystical chakras of the body, he gains superpowers and vows to protect the people of Mumbai as Chakra the Invincible.
